CIPHER.189.cipherString: How rarely reason guides the stubborn choice, Rules the bold hand or prompts the suppliant voice.
CIPHER.189.question: A quote by Johnson has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.
CIPHER.189.author: Johnson

CIPHER.178.cipherString: Dreaming is the fuel in the car of dedication!
CIPHER.178.question: The following strange headlines encode a quote by Todd Stocker using a Baconian cipher. You are told that the deciphered text starts with DREAM
CIPHER.178.author: Todd Stocker

CIPHER.181.cipherString: La expresión por sí sola puede investir a la belleza con un dominio supremo y duradero sobre el ojo.
CIPHER.181.question: A quote by Fuseli in Spanish has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode. It has been encoded using a K1 alphabet using an English keyword.
CIPHER.181.author: Fuseli
CIPHER.181.translation: Expression alone can invest beauty with supreme and lasting command over the eye.

CIPHER.169.cipherString: A smile is the light in your window that tells others that there is a caring, sharing person inside.
CIPHER.169.question: A quote by Denis Waitley has been encoded using the Complete Columnar Cipher for you to decode. You are told that the quote has TELLS somewhere in it.
CIPHER.169.author: Denis Waitley

CIPHER.176.cipherString: One thought cannot awake without awakening others.
CIPHER.176.question: The following symbols encode a quote by Marie Ebner-Eschenbach using a Baconian cipher.  What did they say?
CIPHER.176.author: Marie Ebner-Eschenbach

CIPHER.182.question: The following cryptarithm provides the key to decoding the values 679 8039 4251. What do they decode to?

CIPHER.183.cipherString: The power is yours if you seize it make sure each move you take moves you closer to your goals.
CIPHER.183.question: A quote by Felecia Etienne has been encoded using the K2 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.
CIPHER.183.author: Felecia Etienne

CIPHER.167.question: The following cryptarithm provides the key to decoding the values 53120 4372 9306. What do they decode to?

CIPHER.185.cipherString: My dear doctor, I am surprised to hear you say that I am coughing very badly, as I have been practising all night.
CIPHER.185.question: A quote by John Philpot Curran has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.
CIPHER.185.author: John Philpot Curran

CIPHER.171.cipherString: See the light in others and treat them as if that is all you see.
CIPHER.171.question: The following symbols encode a quote by Wayne Dyer using a Baconian cipher
CIPHER.171.author: Wayne Dyer

CIPHER.177.cipherString: Time and health are two precious assets that we don't recognize and appreciate until they have been depleted.
CIPHER.177.question: A quote by Denis Waitley has been encoded using the K2 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.
CIPHER.177.author: Denis Waitley

CIPHER.174.cipherString: Man little knows what calamities are beyond his patience to bear till he tries them.
CIPHER.174.question: The following quote by Oliver Goldsmith needs to be decoded with the Nihilist Substitution Cipher with a keyword of BUSILY and polybius key of STUMBLING.
CIPHER.174.author: Oliver Goldsmith

CIPHER.170.cipherString: If thee nacients left us idesa, ot oru credit eb it spoken, wee omderns are building houses for them.
CIPHER.170.question: A friend of yours tried to encode a quote by A. B. Alcott as an Aristocrat using a K2 alphabet.  Unfortunately for you they are both a terrible speller and typist.  What did they encode?
CIPHER.170.author: A. B. Alcott

CIPHER.186.cipherString: Wealth consists not in having great possessions, but in having few wants.
CIPHER.186.question: The following quote by Epictetus needs to be decoded with the Porta Cipher with a keyword of LURES
CIPHER.186.author: Epictetus

CIPHER.168.cipherString: I am showing my pupils details of an immense landscape which they cannot possibly know their way around.
CIPHER.168.question: A quote by Ludwig Wittgenstein has been encoded using the K1 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode. What was the K1 Keyword used to encode it?
CIPHER.168.author: Ludwig Wittgenstein

CIPHER.188.cipherString: For that which is without a beginning, a final cause need not be sought.
CIPHER.188.question: A quote by Maimonides has been encoded using the Complete Columnar Cipher for you to decode. You are told that the quote has A FINAL somewhere in it.
CIPHER.188.author: Maimonides

CIPHER.184.cipherString: I left the room with silent dignity, but caught my foot in the mat.
CIPHER.184.question: A quote by George and Weedon Grossmith has been encoded using the Fractionated Morse Cipher for you to decode. You are told that the quote starts with I LEFT TH.
CIPHER.184.author: George and Weedon Grossmith

CIPHER.187.cipherString: Being a leader has allowed me to showcase the power of compassion, kindness, and collective support .
CIPHER.187.question: A quote by Dorcas Affo-Toffey has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.
CIPHER.187.author: Dorcas Affo-Toffey

CIPHER.173.cipherString: I have a fear of being boring.
CIPHER.173.question: Decode the following quote by Christian Bale which was encoded as a 2x2 Hill Cipher using a keyword of PAID.
CIPHER.173.author: Christian Bale

CIPHER.179.cipherString: Be diligent to succeed as there is a way. Where there be no way, only the persistent and diligent find it.
CIPHER.179.question: A quote by Folorunsho Alakija has been encoded using the K3 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode. What was the K3 Keyword used to encode it?
CIPHER.179.author: Folorunsho Alakija

CIPHER.172.cipherString: The progressive development of man is vitally dependent on invention.
CIPHER.172.question: The following quote by Nikola Tesla needs to be decoded with the Nihilist Substitution Cipher with a keyword of EQUAL and polybius key of UNSCRIPTED.
CIPHER.172.author: Nikola Tesla

CIPHER.175.cipherString: I want to do more documentaries and travel to places I haven't been. That is where I think I can be fulfilled.
CIPHER.175.question: A quote by Tatjana Patitz has been encoded using the K2 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode. What was the K2 Keyword used to encode it?
CIPHER.175.author: Tatjana Patitz

CIPHER.180.cipherString: When in doubt, win the trick.
CIPHER.180.question: Decode the following quote by Edmond Hoyle which was encoded as a 2x2 Hill Cipher using a keyword of FERN.
CIPHER.180.author: Edmond Hoyle
